title: C-01 Immutable Verification Log Schema
description: Defines the structure for recording and cryptographically verifying P-01 Gate results, serving as the official audit trail.

log_id.description: A unique identifier for this verification log entry.

p01_result_record.description: The full, immutable output of the P-01 Gate decision.

input_record_hash_reference.description: Direct copy of the input_record_hash from the P01 Result, used as the primary indexing key for traceability.

gate_signature.description: A cryptographic signature (e.g., ECDSA) generated by the Sovereign AGI core signing key, verifying the authenticity and integrity of the p01_result_record.

timestamp_signed_utc.description: The UTC timestamp when this verification record was signed.
